name: Monsieur Le-Furr
T1D: The captain can take the dash or disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.
T2D: The captain makes two attacks: one with a whip, and two with a rapier.
A1D: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.
A2D: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is medium of smaller, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is knocked prone.
